about_the_game:
WELCOME TO BLISS VALLEY!
You live in the quiet small town of Bliss Valley, enjoying a week-long vacation from work. While running errands on your first day, you’ll meet three unique and cute furry characters that you’ll be able to date, romance, and eventually seduce. They each have their own personalities and interests. Use that to your advantage and have fun!

Bliss Valley is a choose-your-own-adventure-style visual novel. You'll be able to make choices throughout the game and select which character you'd like to pursue romantically. Over the course of several dates with one of the characters, they'll become more comfortable around you and open up about themselves. During certain dates, you'll be prompted with a dating mini-game that will test your knowledge of the character's likes and dislikes, so pay attention! If all goes well, you may end up getting lucky with the character you've chosen to date.

  • No AI Art

  • Engaging Dialogue Scenes

  • Original Soundtrack

  • Choices & Outcomes

  • Multiple Characters to Date

  • Diverse Locations 

  • Date-Themed Mini Games

  • Animations

  • Multiple Endings

Bliss Valley features three different characters you can choose to go on dates with.

                                               

                                               

Ellie is a flirtatious femboy dog, who loves to tease and have fun! While they are very playful, they have a hidden depth behind the cute exterior. Ellie hides a vulnerability that he will only share with someone he deeply trusts.

 

Robin is a cute non-binary mouse who loves to geek out about manga and video games. While they are very shy around new people, they love to talk about their interests.                    

Bella is headstrong alternative goat girl. She is fiercely independent and doesn't let many people into her close circle. Dating is not her thing, but that may change if she meets the right person.

Who who will you pick? Immerse yourself by typing in your own name, and live out a fantasy in Bliss Valley!

This game contains explicit sexual content. 
All characters depicted are over the age of 21.
